attributes.action: Leave with-out a deal and respect the outcome of the referendum
attributes.additional_details: We are a strong economical country and we will thrive just as we do now yes there may be set backs at first but at least we wont be under the ruling of the Europe, we take back all of our borders free to trade with allied countrys and not be subjected to the backstops of the EU a hard Brexit is a good Brexit
attributes.background: It is in our best interest to break away from the EU now and leave the customs union the longer this goes on the more uncertainty lies ahead. The government should respect the outcome of the referendum, leave means leave not negotiate some more so we can have a good deal to leave we don't need it.
